item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, May 7, 2025 at 3:20 PM UTC
item.description:

23. VVVVVV Source Code (357 points | 63 comments)

27. DoorDash to acquire Deliveroo (158 points | 268 comments)

29. India launches attack on 9 sites in Pakistan and Pakistani Jammu and Kashmir (435 points | 498 comments)
